title: How Do I Fix My M-I-L Problem?
description:
Angela's mother-in-law is uncomfortably involved in her marriage, and Angela and her husband are ready to move away. - Dr. Laura: "You can't fix a mama's boy, but you can move away from mama."

How's your relationship with your mother-in-law? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
